## âœ… Checklist

<!-- Mark completed items with an "x" -->

### Code Quality
- [ ] My code follows the project's coding standards (CLAUDE.md)
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] I have added/updated docstrings for new/modified functions
- [ ] My code is under 500 lines per file, 50 lines per function
- [ ] No TODOs or FIXMEs left in the code

### Testing
- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes
- [ ] I have tested edge cases and error conditions
- [ ] Code coverage is at least 80% for new code (backend)

### Documentation
- [ ] I have updated relevant documentation (README, docs/)
- [ ] I have updated docs/INDEX.md if I added new documentation
- [ ] I have added examples to examples/ if applicable
- [ ] I have updated CHANGELOG.md with my changes

### Backend Specific
- [ ] Type hints are present for all function signatures
- [ ] Database migrations are included (if schema changed)
- [ ] API endpoints are documented
- [ ] Error handling is comprehensive
- [ ] Linting passes (`uv run ruff check`)
- [ ] Type checking passes (`uv run mypy`)

### Frontend Specific
- [ ] Component is built in Storybook first
- [ ] Accessibility requirements met (ARIA labels, keyboard navigation)
- [ ] Responsive design tested on multiple screen sizes
- [ ] ADHD-optimized UX patterns followed
- [ ] ESLint and Prettier checks pass

### Git
- [ ] My branch is up to date with main
- [ ] Commit messages follow the project's commit message convention
- [ ] I have rebased/squashed commits appropriately
- [ ] No merge conflicts
